content:
SELECT SUM(duration)
AS TOTAL_TIME
FROM Activity_log
WHERE log_timestamp
LIKE "20170214%";

SELECT SUM(duration)
AS "Walking Time"
FROM Activity_log
WHERE ((log_timestamp
LIKE "201702150%")
OR (log_timestamp LIKE "2017021510%")
OR (log_timestamp LIKE "2017021511%"))
AND (act_id = 1);

SELECT Activity.act_name, (Activity_log.duration/60) * Activity.act_cal AS "Calorie Count", Activity_log.log_timestamp
FROM Activity
INNER JOIN Activity_log
ON Activity.act_id=Activity_log.act_id;
